titles.title: Let The Peace Of God Reign

properties.copyright: 1995 Hillsong Publishing, Administered by Integrity Music, Inc.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father of life draw me closer
Lord my heart is set on You
Let me run the race of time
With Your life enfolding mine
And let the peace of God let it reign

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O Holy Spirit You're my comfort
Strengthen me hold my head up high
And I'll stand upon Your truth
Bringing glory unto You
And let the peace of God let it reign

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O Lord I hunger for more of You
Rise up within me let me know Your truth
O Holy Spirit saturate my soul
And let the life of God fill me now
Let Your healing power breathe life
And make me whole
And let the peace of God let it reign
